params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize the CLVP text encoder.

params.name: speech_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize CLVP speech encoder.

params.name: decoder_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize ClvpDecoderConfig.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and speech projection layers.

params.name: logit_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the logit_scale parameter. Default is used as per the original CLVP implementation.

params.name: initializer_factor
params.description: A factor for initializing all weight matrices (should be kept to 1.0, used internally for initializationtesting).
